00051 static uint32_t getPClock (uint32_t timernum);
00052 static uint32_t converUSecToVal (uint32_t timernum, uint32_t usec);
00053 static uint32_t converPtrToTimeNum (LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx);

00056 /*********************************************************************/
00061 static uint32_t getPClock (uint32_t timernum)
00062 {
00063         uint32_t clkdlycnt;
00064         switch (timernum)
00065         {
00066         case 0:
00067                 clkdlycnt = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER0);
00068                 break;
00069 
00070         case 1:
00071                 clkdlycnt = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER1);
00072                 break;
00073 
00074         case 2:
00075                 clkdlycnt = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER2);
00076                 break;
00077 
00078         case 3:
00079                 clkdlycnt = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER3);
00080                 break;
00081         }
00082         return clkdlycnt;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 /*********************************************************************/
00092 uint32_t converUSecToVal (uint32_t timernum, uint32_t usec)
00093 {
00094         uint64_t clkdlycnt;
00095 
00096         // Get Pclock of timer
00097         clkdlycnt = (uint64_t) getPClock(timernum);
00098 
00099         clkdlycnt = (clkdlycnt * usec) / 1000000;
00100         return (uint32_t) clkdlycnt;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 /*********************************************************************/
00113 uint32_t converPtrToTimeNum (LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx)
00114 {
00115         uint32_t tnum = -1;
00116 
00117         if (TIMx == LPC_TIM0)
00118         {
00119                 tnum = 0;
00120         }
00121         else if (TIMx == LPC_TIM1)
00122         {
00123                 tnum = 1;
00124         }
00125         else if (TIMx == LPC_TIM2)
00126         {
00127                 tnum = 2;
00128         }
00129         else if (TIMx == LPC_TIM3)
00130         {
00131                 tnum = 3;
00132         }
00133 
00134         return tnum;
00135 }

00145 /*********************************************************************/
00163 FlagStatus TIM_GetIntStatus(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_INT_TYPE IntFlag)
00164 {
00165         uint8_t temp;
00166         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00167         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_INT_TYPE(IntFlag));
00168         temp = (TIMx->IR)& TIM_IR_CLR(IntFlag);
00169         if (temp)
00170                 return SET;
00171 
00172         return RESET;
00173 
00174 }
00175 /*********************************************************************/
00193 FlagStatus TIM_GetIntCaptureStatus(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_INT_TYPE IntFlag)
00194 {
00195         uint8_t temp;
00196         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00197         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_INT_TYPE(IntFlag));
00198         temp = (TIMx->IR) & (1<<(4+IntFlag));
00199         if(temp)
00200                 return SET;
00201         return RESET;
00202 }
00203 /*********************************************************************/
00219 void TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_INT_TYPE IntFlag)
00220 {
00221         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00222         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_INT_TYPE(IntFlag));
00223         TIMx->IR = TIM_IR_CLR(IntFlag);
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*********************************************************************/
00242 void TIM_ClearIntCapturePending(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_INT_TYPE IntFlag)
00243 {
00244         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00245         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_INT_TYPE(IntFlag));
00246         TIMx->IR = (1<<(4+IntFlag));
00247 }

00249 /*********************************************************************/
00260 void TIM_ConfigStructInit(TIM_MODE_OPT TimerCounterMode, void *TIM_ConfigStruct)
00261 {
00262         if (TimerCounterMode == TIM_TIMER_MODE )
00263         {
00264                 TIM_TIMERCFG_Type * pTimeCfg = (TIM_TIMERCFG_Type *)TIM_ConfigStruct;
00265                 pTimeCfg->PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00266                 pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue = 1;
00267         }
00268         else
00269         {
00270                 TIM_COUNTERCFG_Type * pCounterCfg = (TIM_COUNTERCFG_Type *)TIM_ConfigStruct;
00271                 pCounterCfg->CountInputSelect = TIM_COUNTER_INCAP0;
00272         }
00273 }
00274 
00275 /*********************************************************************/
00294 void TIM_Init(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_MODE_OPT TimerCounterMode, void *TIM_ConfigStruct)
00295 {
00296         TIM_TIMERCFG_Type *pTimeCfg;
00297         TIM_COUNTERCFG_Type *pCounterCfg;
00298 
00299         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00300         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_MODE_OPT(TimerCounterMode));
00301 
00302         //set power
00303 
00304         if (TIMx== LPC_TIM0)
00305         {
00306                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM0, ENABLE);
00307                 //PCLK_Timer0 = CCLK/4
00308                 CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER0, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00309         }
00310         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM1)
00311         {
00312                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM1, ENABLE);
00313                 //PCLK_Timer1 = CCLK/4
00314                 CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER1, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00315 
00316         }
00317 
00318         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM2)
00319         {
00320                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM2, ENABLE);
00321                 //PCLK_Timer2= CCLK/4
00322                 CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER2, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00323         }
00324         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM3)
00325         {
00326                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM3, ENABLE);
00327                 //PCLK_Timer3= CCLK/4
00328                 CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_TIMER3, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00329 
00330         }
00331 
00332         TIMx->CCR &= ~TIM_CTCR_MODE_MASK;
00333         TIMx->CCR |= TIM_TIMER_MODE;
00334 
00335         TIMx->TC =0;
00336         TIMx->PC =0;
00337         TIMx->PR =0;
00338         TIMx->TCR |= (1<<1); //Reset Counter
00339         TIMx->TCR &= ~(1<<1); //release reset
00340         if (TimerCounterMode == TIM_TIMER_MODE )
00341         {
00342                 pTimeCfg = (TIM_TIMERCFG_Type *)TIM_ConfigStruct;
00343                 if (pTimeCfg->PrescaleOption  == TIM_PRESCALE_TICKVAL)
00344                 {
00345                         TIMx->PR   = pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue -1  ;
00346                 }
00347                 else
00348                 {
00349                         TIMx->PR   = converUSecToVal (converPtrToTimeNum(TIMx),pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue)-1;
00350                 }
00351         }
00352         else
00353         {
00354 
00355                 pCounterCfg = (TIM_COUNTERCFG_Type *)TIM_ConfigStruct;
00356                 TIMx->CCR  &= ~TIM_CTCR_INPUT_MASK;
00357                 if (pCounterCfg->CountInputSelect == TIM_COUNTER_INCAP1)
00358                         TIMx->CCR |= _BIT(2);
00359         }
00360 
00361         // Clear interrupt pending
00362         TIMx->IR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00363 
00364 }
00365 
00366 /*********************************************************************/
00375 void TIM_DeInit (LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx)
00376 {
00377         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00378         // Disable timer/counter
00379         TIMx->TCR = 0x00;
00380 
00381         // Disable power
00382         if (TIMx== LPC_TIM0)
00383                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM0, DISABLE);
00384 
00385         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM1)
00386                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM1, DISABLE);
00387 
00388         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM2)
00389                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM2, DISABLE);
00390 
00391         else if (TIMx== LPC_TIM3)
00392                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCTIM2, DISABLE);
00393 
00394 }
00395 
00396 /*********************************************************************/
00408 void TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, FunctionalState NewState)
00409 {
00410         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00411         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00412         {
00413                 TIMx->TCR       |=  TIM_ENABLE;
00414         }
00415         else
00416         {
00417                 TIMx->TCR &= ~TIM_ENABLE;
00418         }
00419 }
00420 
00421 /*********************************************************************/
00432 void TIM_ResetCounter(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx)
00433 {
00434         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00435         TIMx->TCR |= TIM_RESET;
00436         TIMx->TCR &= ~TIM_RESET;
00437 }
00438 
00439 /*********************************************************************/
00462 void TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_MATCHCFG_Type *TIM_MatchConfigStruct)
00463 {
00464 
00465         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00466         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_EXTMATCH_OPT(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->ExtMatchOutputType));
00467 
00468         switch(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel)
00469         {
00470         case 0:
00471                 TIMx->MR0 = TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchValue;
00472                 break;
00473         case 1:
00474                 TIMx->MR1 = TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchValue;
00475                 break;
00476         case 2:
00477                 TIMx->MR2 = TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchValue;
00478                 break;
00479         case 3:
00480                 TIMx->MR3 = TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchValue;
00481                 break;
00482         default:
00483                 //Error match value
00484                 //Error loop
00485                 while(1);
00486         }
00487         //interrupt on MRn
00488         TIMx->MCR &=~TIM_MCR_CHANNEL_MASKBIT(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00489 
00490         if (TIM_MatchConfigStruct->IntOnMatch)
00491                 TIMx->MCR |= TIM_INT_ON_MATCH(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00492 
00493         //reset on MRn
00494         if (TIM_MatchConfigStruct->ResetOnMatch)
00495                 TIMx->MCR |= TIM_RESET_ON_MATCH(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00496 
00497         //stop on MRn
00498         if (TIM_MatchConfigStruct->StopOnMatch)
00499                 TIMx->MCR |= TIM_STOP_ON_MATCH(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00500 
00501         // match output type
00502 
00503         TIMx->EMR       &= ~TIM_EM_MASK(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00504         TIMx->EMR   |= TIM_EM_SET(TIM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel,TIM_MatchConfigStruct->ExtMatchOutputType);
00505 }
00506 /*********************************************************************/
00517 void TIM_UpdateMatchValue(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx,uint8_t MatchChannel, uint32_t MatchValue)
00518 {
00519         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00520         switch(MatchChannel)
00521         {
00522         case 0:
00523                 TIMx->MR0 = MatchValue;
00524                 break;
00525         case 1:
00526                 TIMx->MR1 = MatchValue;
00527                 break;
00528         case 2:
00529                 TIMx->MR2 = MatchValue;
00530                 break;
00531         case 3:
00532                 TIMx->MR3 = MatchValue;
00533                 break;
00534         default:
00535                 //Error Loop
00536                 while(1);
00537         }
00538 
00539 }
00540 /*********************************************************************/
00554 void TIM_ConfigCapture(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_CAPTURECFG_Type *TIM_CaptureConfigStruct)
00555 {
00556 
00557         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00558         TIMx->CCR &= ~TIM_CCR_CHANNEL_MASKBIT(TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00559 
00560         if (TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->RisingEdge)
00561                 TIMx->CCR |= TIM_CAP_RISING(TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00562 
00563         if (TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->FallingEdge)
00564                 TIMx->CCR |= TIM_CAP_FALLING(TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00565 
00566         if (TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->IntOnCaption)
00567                 TIMx->CCR |= TIM_INT_ON_CAP(TIM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00568 }
00569 
00570 /*********************************************************************/
00582 uint32_t TIM_GetCaptureValue(LPC_TIM_TypeDef *TIMx, TIM_COUNTER_INPUT_OPT CaptureChannel)
00583 {
00584         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIMx(TIMx));
00585         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_TIM_COUNTER_INPUT_OPT(CaptureChannel));
00586 
00587         if(CaptureChannel==0)
00588                 return TIMx->CR0;
00589         else
00590                 return TIMx->CR1;
00591 }
